markdownRemark.html:
What is it?

GitHub Copilot is an AI to help you code faster by suggesting snippets.

My views

In the interest of full transparency I have not played around with GitHub Copilot. In light of that some of my concerns may be unfounded. As I see it one of the biggest benefits may be time savings. On the other hand, I see potential for some downfalls as well.

  • If the developer is not paying attention to the code then the style may not match what the team wants.
  • It is incumbent upon the developer to understand the suggested code.
  • This has the potential to lead to code that is hard to support if the dev team doesn’t fully understand what is going on.
  • If used for testing the developer must make sure the test case is necessary and complete.

I am not trying to say Copilot is a bad tool. I am just trying to say it will require dilligence by the developer for it to be effective.
